 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִדָּה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==a spice==, usually ==cassia== [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] compare [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>Ex</sup>; √ dubious; perhaps foreign word); \*— merchandise [[Ezek.27.19|Ezek 27:19]] ingredient of sacred oil [[Exod.30.24|Exod 30:24]] ([[BDB#P|P]]): — compare [[BDB#Dioscor|Dioscor]]: [[BDB#De|De]] Mater. Med. I.12 (<span class="bdbLangGreek">κασσία</span> = <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἡ κιττώ</span>) [[BDB#Theophr|Theophr]]<sup>Hist. Paint ix. 5</sup> [[BDB#Plin|Plin]]<sup>NH xii. 19 (42 ff.)</sup>; see also [[BDB#Schröd|Schröd]]<sup>Phoenician Spr. 126</sup> [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Fremdw. 36</sup>. 

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדַח‎</span>] **verb** ==be kindled, kindle== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, also ***bore***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְדַח‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bore, kindle***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> strike fire (with flint, etc.); Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מקדח‎</span> is ***lamp-lighter*** (in temple) accusative To [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>I, No.352, i.s</sup>); — 

**Qal 1.** ==be kindled:== ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ קָֽדְחָה בְּאַפִּי‎</span> [[Deut.32.22|Deut 32:22]]; [[Jer.15.14|Jer 15:14]]; [[Jer.15.14|Jer 15:14]]; [[Jer.17.4|Jer 17:4]] (reading<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽדְחָה‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְדַחְתֶּם‎</span>), all of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s wrath. 

**2.** active ***kindle; Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּקְדֹחַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ הֲמָסִים‎</span> [[Isa.64.1|Isa 64:1]] (see [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶמֶס‎</span>]); Participle<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹדְחֵי אֵשׁ‎</span> [[Isa.50.11|Isa 50:11]].
